law.catch_line: The subdivisions enumerated in this subsection may adopt ordinances or resolutions supplementing thi...

text.section:
This subheading does not apply in the following subdivisions:
Kent County; and
Queen Anne's County.

In the City of Annapolis and the City of Frederick, the Mayor and Aldermen may regulate within the city limits the possession or consumption of any alcoholic beverages on any public property owned by the city or on any public highway.
